original_text: And the lord said unto the servant, Go out into the highways and hedges, and compel them to come in, that my house may be filled.
korean_text: 주인이 종에게 이르되 길과 산울타리 가로 나가서 사람을 강권하여 데려다가 내 집을 채우라

sentences.original_text: And the lord said unto his servant
Go out into the highways and hedges
and compel them to come in
that my house may be filled
